CustomField.description: Created as part of the SFS-6686 to showcase the icon to the user on mobile Updated as part of SFS-8423 Updated as part of SFL-1204
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c,"05") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c,"04"),"Check TMA in details" , IF( ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "CANC") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "COMP") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PREV") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PHCO") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_Type__c, "REV"), "ðŸ”´ TMA Stopped",
IF( ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "WIP") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PRRE") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "IREI") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PREI"), "ðŸŸ¢ TMA Started",
IF( ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PLND") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "CRTD") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "FPI") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "API") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "RPA") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PADP") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PAA") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "RP") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PVAR") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PRF") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PDP") || ISPICKVAL(FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PA"), "ðŸŸ¡ TMA Not Started", "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: TMA Status Icon
